G 11:31:51.40200, -12:31:59.23 <=> 172.964175, -12.53311944
A 11:31:51.53712, -12:31:59.8396 <=> 172.964738027, -12.53328
# B_ra_deg = A_ra_deg + 0.032 / cos(-12.533*pi/360) / 3600
B 11:31:51.53927, -12:31:58.6515 <=> 172.9647
# C_ra_deg = A_ra_deg + (-0.59 /cos(-12.533 * pi/180) /3600.)
